Uses of Interface
com.jme3.asset.AssetLocator

  • Packages that use AssetLocator 
    Package Description
    com.jme3.asset
    com.jme3.asset contains the AssetManager, a utility class that is used to load assets such as textures, models, and sound effects in a jME3 application.
    com.jme3.asset.plugins  

    • Uses of AssetLocator in com.jme3.asset

      Method parameters in com.jme3.asset with type arguments of type AssetLocator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AssetManager.registerLocator(java.lang.String rootPath, java.lang.Class<? extends AssetLocator> locatorClass)
      Registers the given locator class for locating assets with this AssetManager.
      void DesktopAssetManager.registerLocator(java.lang.String rootPath, java.lang.Class<? extends AssetLocator> locatorClass) 
      void AssetManager.unregisterLocator(java.lang.String rootPath, java.lang.Class<? extends AssetLocator> locatorClass)
      Unregisters the given locator class.
      void DesktopAssetManager.unregisterLocator(java.lang.String rootPath, java.lang.Class<? extends AssetLocator> clazz) 

    • Uses of AssetLocator in com.jme3.asset.plugins

      Classes in com.jme3.asset.plugins that implement AssetLocator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClasspathLocator
      The ClasspathLocator looks up an asset in the classpath.
      class  FileLocator
      FileLocator allows you to specify a folder where to look for assets.
      class  HttpZipLocator
      HttpZipLocator is similar to ZipLocator, except it allows loading assets from a .ZIP file on the web instead of on the local filesystem.
      class  UrlLocator
      UrlLocator is a locator that combines a root URL and the given path in the AssetKey to construct a new URL that allows locating the asset.
      class  ZipLocator
      ZipLocator is a locator that looks up resources in a .ZIP file.
